info.title: Nginx Proxy Manager API
info.description:
This is the official API documentation for Nginx Proxy Manager.

Most endpoints require authentication via Bearer Token (JWT). You can generate a token by logging in via the `POST /tokens` endpoint.

For more information, visit the [Nginx Proxy Manager Documentation](https://nginxproxymanager.com).

tags.name: public
tags.description: Endpoints that do not require authentication
